stories.text:
I love hacker news for the diversity of topics and the often good insights one can gain. Do you know of a similar source which is more focused on machine learning?

One obvious place is https://www.reddit.com/r/MachineLearning/, but maybe you know of others?
stories.title: Ask HN: Hacker News like community for machine learning?

stories.text:
Seems this would be a good time to buy :). I live in Europe so some local setup would be ideal.

I have some normal stocks through degiro.nl.

Thanks!
